00067 NonmemTranslator::NonmemTranslator( DOMDocument* sourceIn, DOMDocument* dataIn )
00068   : ClientTranslator                    ( sourceIn, dataIn ),
00069     myDescription                       ( NULL ),
00070     myModelSpec                         ( PRED ),
00071     myTrans                             ( TRANS1 ),
00072     myIsEstimate                        ( true ),
00073     myIsSimulate                        ( false ),
00074     myIsIdent                           ( false ),
00075     myIsNonparam                        ( false ),
00076     myNonparamGridMeasurePointPerSideIn ( 0 ),
00077     myNonparamRandomMeasurePointIn      ( 0 ),
00078     myIsMonte                           ( false ),
00079     myIsStat                            ( false ),
00080     mySubproblemsN                      ( 1 ),
00081     myIntegMethod                       ( PLAIN ),
00082     myIntegNumberEvals                  ( 1 ), // this is a vector
00083     myIntegNEvals                       ( 1 ),
00084     myIsPosthoc                         ( true ),
00085     myIsRestart                         ( false ),
00086     myIndWriteCheckpoint                ( true ),
00087     myPopWriteCheckpoint                ( true ),
00088     myThetaLen                          ( 0 ),
00089     myOmegaDim                          ( 0 ),                 //valarray
00090     myOmegaOrder                        ( 0 ),                 //valarray
00091     myOmegaStruct                       ( Symbol::TRIANGLE ),  //valarray
00092     myOmegaSameAsPrev                   ( false ),             //valarray
00093     mySigmaDim                          ( 0 ),                 //valarray
00094     mySigmaOrder                        ( 0 ),                 //valarray
00095     mySigmaStruct                       ( Symbol::TRIANGLE ),  //valarray
00096     mySigmaSameAsPrev                   ( false ),             //valarray
00097     myEtaLen                            ( 0 ),
00098     myEpsLen                            ( 0 ),
00099     mySigDigits                         ( 3 ),
00100     myPopMitr                           ( 100 ),
00101     myIndMitr                           ( 100 ),
00102     myPopEpsilon                        ( pow    ( 10.0, -(mySigDigits+1.0) ) ),
00103     myIndEpsilon                        ( pow    ( 10.0, -(mySigDigits+1.0) ) ),
00104     myPopTraceLevel                     ( 1 ),
00105     myIndTraceLevel                     ( 1 ),
00106     mySeed                              ( 0 ),
00107     myCovForm                           ( "RSR" ), // default for population level
00108     myIsStderr                          ( true ),
00109     myIsCorrelation                     ( true ),
00110     myIsCov                             ( true ),
00111     myIsInvCov                          ( true ),
00112     myIsConfidence                      ( true ),
00113     myIsCoefficient                     ( true ),
00114     myRecordNums                        ( 1 ),
00115     myCompModel                         ( NULL ),
00116     myIsMissingCmt                      ( true ),
00117     myIsMissingPcmt                     ( true ),
00118     myIsMissingRate                     ( true )
00119 {
00120   table = ClientTranslator::getSymbolTable();
00121 
00122   myPopEpsilon = pow( 10.0, -(mySigDigits+1.0) );
00123   myIndEpsilon = pow( 10.0, -(mySigDigits+1.0) );
00124 
00125   // Clean up reminents from a previous run.
00126   remove( fMakefile );
00127   remove( fIndData_h );
00128   remove( fDataSet_h );
00129   remove( fPredEqn_fortran );
00130   remove( fPredEqn_cpp );
00131   remove( fPred_h );
00132   remove( fDiffEqn_fortran );
00133   remove( fDiffEqn_cpp );
00134   remove( fOdePred_h );
00135   remove( fIdentPred_h );
00136   remove( fPkEqn_fortran );
00137   remove( fPkEqn_cpp );
00138   remove( fErrorEqn_fortran );
00139   remove( fErrorEqn_cpp );
00140   remove( fNonmemPars_h );
00141   remove( fMontePars_h );
00142   remove( fFitDriver_cpp );
00143   remove( fIndDriver_cpp );
00144   remove( fMonteDriver_cpp );
00145   remove( fSpkRuntimeLongError_tmp );
00146   remove( fResult_xml );
00147 }
00148 NonmemTranslator::NonmemTranslator()
00149 {
00150 }
00151 NonmemTranslator::~NonmemTranslator()
00152 {
00153   if( myDescription )
00154     delete [] myDescription;
00155   if( myCompModel )
00156     delete myCompModel;
00157 }
